description: Andika is a neutral, readable sans-serif font designed for educational use and clear communication. It offers simplicity, clarity, and a modern feel. Andika works well in textbooks, e-learning platforms, and accessible design contexts.

name: Amatic SC
description: Amatic SC is an informal, narrow handwritten display font with quirky and playful characteristics. It conveys a casual, artistic, and distinctive personality. Amatic SC is popular for creative headlines, posters, and unique branding projects.

name: Alice
description: Alice is a classic serif font designed for elegant literary works with formal and traditional influences. It embodies grace, refinement, and a sense of formality. Alice is well suited for novels, formal publications, and sophisticated print design.

name: Alfa Slab One
description: Alfa Slab One is a bold slab-serif display font created to grab attention with modern, impactful shapes. It feels strong, assertive, and contemporary. Alfa Slab One is ideal for headlines, posters, and branding that demands a loud visual voice.

name: Alegreya
description: Alegreya is a humanist serif font designed to provide readability and a harmonious rhythm for literary texts. It offers warmth, classic beauty, and a timeless literary feel. Alegreya is perfect for books, magazines, and long-form reading projects.

name: Abril Fatface
description: Abril Fatface is a classic serif font inspired by heavy 19th-century display types used in posters and headlines. It conveys elegance, boldness, and a dramatic presence. Abril Fatface excels in editorial titles, advertising, and high-impact branding.

name: Abel
description: Abel is a geometric sans-serif font created with minimalist bold strokes suited for modern design. It projects confidence, clarity, and straightforwardness. Abel works well for headlines, branding, and contemporary digital projects.

name: ABeeZee
description: ABeeZee is a sans-serif font designed for maximum readability with a clean, modern, and neutral look. It offers a friendly and approachable feel with humanist influences. ABeeZee is great for web content, educational materials, and any project needing a simple yet warm typeface.

name: Birthstone
description: Birthstone is an elegant and stylish script font featuring curly strokes and delicate loops. It evokes refinement, grace, and artistic flair. Birthstone is perfect for invitations, branding, and projects seeking a sophisticated, handwritten feel.

name: Arimo
description: Arimo is a neutral and legible sans serif font created as a versatile alternative to Arial with strong clarity. It carries professionalism, simplicity, and straightforwardness. Arimo is ideal for user interfaces, corporate materials, and general-purpose communication.

name: DM Sans
description: DM Sans is a clean and simple sans serif font designed for modern clarity and readability. It offers a minimal, contemporary, and approachable personality. DM Sans is suited for web interfaces, branding, and any project that values straightforward, legible typography.

name: Ooh Baby
description: Ooh Baby is a playful and casual script font with a handwritten, charming style. It expresses fun, cuteness, and a friendly, informal vibe. Ooh Baby works well in invitations, children’s content, and projects requiring a personal and lighthearted touch.

name: Old Standard TT
description: Old Standard TT is a classic serif font inspired by traditional typesetting and designed for legibility and elegance. It embodies a timeless, graceful, and contrasted personality. Old Standard TT is ideal for book typography, academic publications, and projects seeking a historic or refined tone.

name: Josefin Slab
description: Josefin Slab was inspired by 1920s geometric typefaces and designed as a vintage slab serif with thin strokes. It conveys a retro, stylish, and elegant vibe. Josefin Slab is great for headlines, branding, and creative editorial use.

name: Bree Serif
description: Bree Serif was designed by TypeTogether with friendly curves and contemporary warmth in a slab serif form. It offers personality, energy, and an approachable elegance. Bree Serif is suitable for advertising, editorial work, and branding with a friendly touch.

name: Praise
description: Praise was designed as a flowing and charming script with romantic and graceful curves. It exudes warmth, elegance, and expressiveness. Praise is perfect for invitations, personal projects, and branding with a romantic flair.

name: Average
description: Average was designed as a warm and readable serif with balanced forms for comfortable reading. It conveys harmony, balance, and simplicity. Average is suited for body text, books, and projects requiring legibility and warmth.

name: Caveat
description: Caveat was created by Pablo Impallari as a casual, handwritten script with natural spontaneity. It evokes friendliness, playfulness, and personal connection. Caveat is ideal for informal notes, personal branding, and creative projects looking for a human touch.

name: Pinyon Script
description: Pinyon Script was designed by Rob Leuschke as a romantic and elegant script with flowing curls and loops. It feels expressive, whimsical, and artistic. Pinyon Script is excellent for wedding invitations, greeting cards, and creative branding needing a personal touch.

name: Inter
description: Inter was designed by Rasmus Andersson for digital interfaces prioritizing readability and performance. It is sleek, futuristic, and highly compatible with various screen sizes and uses. Inter is commonly used in UI design, websites, and apps requiring optimal legibility.

name: Syne
description: Syne was designed by Indian Type Foundry as a creative and eccentric display font with tactile characteristics. It carries a whimsical, artistic energy with varied weights and expressive styles. Syne works well in headlines, logos, and creative branding needing a unique, eye-catching look.

name: Archivo
description: Archivo was created by Omnibus-Type inspired by 20th-century technical typography for high-performance use. It is modern, dynamic, and technical with strong, functional shapes. Archivo suits editorial, branding, and projects requiring clarity and impactful communication.

name: Teko
description: Teko was designed by Indian Type Foundry as a wide, condensed sans serif for display use. It projects a cutting-edge, futuristic vibe with its bold and wide structure. Teko is perfect for headlines, posters, and projects wanting to convey strength and modernity.

name: Fira Sans
description: Fira Sans was designed by Erik Spiekermann for Mozilla’s Firefox OS with a minimalist and modern approach. It embodies sleekness, futurism, and innovation with its clean shapes. Fira Sans is ideal for tech interfaces, apps, and futuristic branding projects.

name: Bitter
description: Bitter was created by Sol Matas as a slab serif with strong serifs and high contrast for digital reading. It conveys a stylish, contemporary feel with a solid and confident voice. Bitter is perfect for editorial projects, blogs, and websites emphasizing clarity and impact.

name: Source Sans 3
description: Source Sans 3 is an evolution of Adobe’s Source Sans, designed for clean and simple UI use. It embodies professionalism, clarity, and versatility with a straightforward sans serif style. This font excels in interfaces, web content, and corporate design systems.
